original_text: But she carried her whoring further. She saw men portrayed on the wall, the images of the Chaldeans portrayed in vermilion,
korean_text: 그가 음행을 더하였음은 붉은 색으로 벽에 그린 사람의 형상 곧 갈대아 사람의 형상을 보았음이니

sentences.original_text: But she carried her whoring further.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그녀는 그녀의 음행을 더욱 행했습니다.

sentences.original_text: She saw men portrayed on the wall
the images of the Chaldeans portrayed in vermilion,
